DOC.brief_title: The Exercise Capacity Quality Life Patients With IPAH Secondary PH
DOC.detailed_description: Background . Pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) progressive disease high mortality rate , due development drug , prognosis disease improve . However patient still poor exercise capacity decrease quality life . Past study show idiopathic secondary PH different etiology prognosis . It necessary understand difference exercise capacity quality life two type patient . Purpose . The purpose study comparison idiopathic secondary PH exercise capacity quality life , analyzed factor affect . Method . The patient recruit National Taiwan University hospital . Thirty patient diagnosis PH willing participant study recruit . According cause disease patient divide two group , idiopathic group secondary PH group fifteen patient . Both group receive testing , include body composition , exercise capacity ( six minute walk test , cardiopulmonary exercise test ) , record regular physical activity ( seven day physical activity recall questionnaire ) , fatigue severity ( fatigue severity scale ) , quality life ( SF-36 ) , monitor cardiac function ( non-invasive cardiac output test instrument ) . Data analyze use SPSS19.0 version . Data present mean ± standard deviation percentage . Using Kolmogorov-Smirmov test test , whether data normal distribution , P > 0.05 consider normal distribution . Mann-Whitney U test Chi-square test processing parameter two group . Independent sample test use compare whether between-group difference . Pearson correlation coefficient use test correlation parameter . The study define significant level α = 0.05 , two-tailed .
